result.arabic_text: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا
result.translation: Ni ho rero Zakariya yava aho yari yiherereye, araheza aja aho abantu bamubona aca abereka n’ukuboko ati: “Nimuninahaze mwongere mutazire Imana Allah igitondo n’umugoroba, mu ntumbero yo kuyishimira”.
